title: Oman’s bold new expat permit pricing: Fee hikes and discounts to push Omanisation goals
summary_full: Oman is revolutionising foreign worker hiring with a tiered fee system for work permits, directly linking costs to national employment targets. Companies meeting local hire quotas receive significant discounts, while those falling short face doubled fees. This initiative aims to boost Omani employment and reduce reliance on expatriate labour, reflecting a regional trend.
